proposeLaw.name: Propose a Bill
proposeLaw.desc: Place your pawn on an adjacent section. Option: 1 Influence for Immediate Vote.

assignWorkers.name: Assign Workers
assignWorkers.desc: Assign up to 3 Workers to Companies and/or Unions.

buyGoods.name: Buy Goods/Services
buyGoods.desc: Choose 1 resource, buy from up to 2 suppliers. Limit: Population per supplier.

strike.name: Strike
strike.desc: Place up to 2 Strike tokens on Companies (Workers not under contract, Wage N1-N2).

protest.name: Protest
protest.desc: If ≥2 idle Workers more than available positions: place Protest token.

politicalPressure.name: Political Pressure
politicalPressure.desc: Add 3 Vote cubes to the bag.

healthServices.name: Health Services
healthServices.desc: Spend Health = Population → +1 Prosperity, +2 VP, +1 grey Worker

training.name: Training/Education
training.desc: Spend Education = Population → +1 Prosperity, upgrade 1 Worker

transferWorkers.name: Transfer Workers
transferWorkers.desc: Exchange skilled Workers (unskilled positions) with Idle Workers

collectBenefits.name: Collect Benefits
collectBenefits.desc: (4p) Take resources from State Benefits area
